IV. Site Content & Liability

The information on this site is provided for informational purposes only and must not be considered as medical advice. It is not intended to replace a consultation with a qualified healthcare professional. In accordance with the Belgian Health Quality Act, the content is objective, verifiable, and not intended to unlawfully recruit patients or encourage unnecessary treatments.

In compliance with INAMI/RIZIV regulations, this website makes no mention of health insurance reimbursement for services.

V. Intellectual Property

All content on diaeta.be (text, images, logo) is the exclusive property of Pierre Abou-Zeid and is protected by copyright. Any reproduction without prior written permission is prohibited.

VII. Applicable Law & Jurisdiction

These legal notices are governed by Belgian law. Any dispute shall fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Brussels.
